sample.title: Custom Culture Sample
sample.overview:
The CustomCulture sample shows how to create a custom culture by creating a new class that inherits from the CultureInfo class. This custom culture can be used for both formatting information (currency amount in this sample) and to retrieve resources from a satellite resource DLL. In retrieving resources, it also demonstrates how to retrieve resources from a parallel assembly.
This sample can only be built from the command line. It can not be built using Microsoft Visual Studio .NET.

buildsteps.step:
Type BUILD.bat from the command line.
C:\Program Files\Microsoft.NET\SDK\v1.1\Samples\Technologies\Localization\CustomCulture\VB>Build.bat

runsteps.step:
Type CustomCulture.exe from the command line.
C:\Program Files\Microsoft.NET\SDK\v1.1\Samples\Technologies\Localization\CustomCulture\VB>CustomCulture.exe
